articles.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Month: How diagnosis techniques have evolved beyond mammograms - Times Now
articles.description: For a long time, experts have relied on mammograms for breast cancer diagnosis. A mammogram is an X-ray picture of the breast to diagnose early signs of breast cancer.
articles.content: • Mammograms are considered to be the best test for timely diagnosis as it can spot the tumour early, sometimes even three years before the signs start to appear externally.
